Description:
Detects usage of Dsacls to grant over permissive permissions

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Over Permissive Permissions Granted Using Dsacls.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\dsacls.exe' and original_file_name = 'dsacls.exe') and command like '% /g %' and (command like '%gr%' or command like '%ge%' or command like '%gw%' or command like '%ga%' or command like '%wp%' or command like '%wd%'))
